metadata.synopsis: This PAD triggers if/when the player kills all the Kuo-Toa and BOOOAL's magic disappates - the beat is 'he was no true god, his power came from those fish creatures'.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Not much of a god after all. Whatever power he had, it died with those creatures.
0.context: NodeContext: BOO-al (not pronounced with extra emphasis, its just how the local fish people stylize it)
